testcaseName: Child entered season at 8 years of age, received dose before 9. Forecast another dose
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child enters the flu season at age 8 years, received their first dose, but is now 9 years old. Per flu recommendations, the patient needs a second dose.
reasonForChange:
V4.26: Rolled test cases forward from 2021-2022 season to 2022-2023 season.
V4.10: Rolled test cases forward from 2020-2021 season to 2021-2022 season.
V4.4: Rolled test cases forward from 2019-2020 season to 2020-2021 season.
